pullrequest.title: Added mac install instructions for dartsim

content.raw:
Although I understand the whole thing, for users is probably weird to try to install DART and see the command with:

```
brew install gazebo4 --with-bullet --with-simbody
```

I can think on several ways to make it a bit clearer, maybe including a comment before the command:

```
#!bin/bash
# gazebo will be built with DART (autodetected), bullet and simbody
brew install gazebo4 --with-bullet --with-simbody
```
content.html:
